Package com.example.mydmsproject.model

Class Scenes

java.lang.Object
com.example.mydmsproject.model.Scenes
public class Scenes extends Object
A model class that stores all scenes and game elements, used for controllers and renderer to get/set scenes and other elements.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Scenes(int width, int height, javafx.stage.Stage stage)
    Default class constructor, initialize all the scenes and set start scene to the stage.

      height - the height of the stage
      stage - the primary stage
